name: King Bhumibol Adulyadej
description: Ninth King of Thailand and world's longest-reigning monarch, beloved for his dedication to his people, development projects, and musical talents
philosophy: The real development is the development of man. It is the development of human knowledge, human ability, human understanding, and human compassion.
quotes: The happiness and prosperity of the nation depends on the diligence and sacrifice of all of us
Music creates goodwill. It brings people together
